Step_narr_in: Log into the ISM Tech Mobile App on a touchscreen tablet device Create a new SRO within the ISM Tech Mobile App Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Tap on the Tech Mobile App menu icon located at upper left to display the menu ISM Tech Mobile App From the menu tap on New Service Order to select it and navigate to the New Service Order screen Tap on magnifying glass icon to the right of Customer to open the Customer Lookup screen New Service Order Screen Tap on Customer Number and enter the number if known (for this example 8095) Customer Lookup Screen Tap blue Search button to search for customer in ISM Tap on blue name of customer to display customer information records found in ISM is correct Customers Screen Tap on the back arrow located at upper left to go back a screen Tap on blue Search button to again search for customer in ISM with previously found information Tap on blue name of customer to select confirmed customer Tap three dots icon at upper right and select New Service Order from drop down Tap on magnifying glass icon to the right of Unit to open Unit/Item Search screen New Service Order Screen Tap on blue serial number of unit to select it and then tap Done in upper right of screen Unit/Item Search Screen Tap Done in upper right corner to create new Servive Repair Order New Service Order Screen Tap Done a second time to confirm

Select the appointment you are traveling to Travel to Site Tech Mobile App Select operation 20 labor to clock into labor for travel Click in and begin travel Tech drives to appointment Selects the labor operator again to prompt Clock out of labor when you arrive and select the work code for travel based on type generator (Resi vs Ind) Hit "done"

Clock into operation 10 parts for onsite service Perform Site Work Now select materials Click on planned at this time the actual will be empty Click on the material you want to consume Click on material they want to use Check the box consumed. Then click done Back arrow Clock out of labor Change the work code to service RESI/IND onsite depending on the type of service show in earlier screen Click done

Tap on menu icon Navigate to Materials in Appointment Details Tap on the Work Queue Tap the radio dial of the the appointment you are servicing. On the Wok Queue screen, select the appointment from either "Today" or " All" tap materials. Scroll to bottom of screen to reach materials tap the plus Add Material Upper right corner of material screen tap actual material tap the Search magnifying glass enter item to be used during servicing. Example: "15W40" for oil Search Select the material from the search findings. tap radio dial Tap Done At the top of the pop up Tap on Quantity to enter quantity. For this example of number of oil quarts needed 3. Tap Done At the top of the screen Do not change price or cost

Once on site work is complete, clock into operation 1/ 20 for the drive back to the shop, by tapping 1/20Trouble ServiceLabor Travel Leaving Site Tap Clock In from pop up Once at the shop or next appointment clock out of operation 1/20 by tapping 1/20Trouble ServiceLabor Tap Clock out from the pop up
Click SRO status on the appointment detail Change Status to Callback Tech Mobile App Add a note to the SRO note return service is required Click on hold to note the problem has not been solved
Click SRO status on the appointment detail Change Status Closed Tech Mobile App Close the SRO by clicking close The appointment will disappear from the work queue
